title: PBS-Bill Moyers Journal-Dec 26, 2008-BEYOND OUR DIFFERENCES
description:
PBS-Bill Moyers Journal-Dec 26, 2008-BEYOND OUR DIFFERENCES

sdtv xvid



BEYOND OUR DIFFERENCES

Bill Moyers Journal presents the film BEYOND OUR DIFFERENCES which explores the common threads that unify the world's religious traditions.

BILL MOYERS ON FAITH & REASON

In this 2007 series Bill Moyers talked with some of the provocative voices assembled at the PEN World Voices Festival and others grappling with issues of faith and reason. View the entire series online and explore many perspectives on topics like faith and science, myths and sacred texts, and more.

DESMOND TUTU AND OTHERS

Archbishop Desmond Tutu is one of the world leaders interviewed in BEYOND OUR DIFFERENCES. Watch Bill Moyers' 1999 discussion with Tutu about chairmanship of the South African Truth and Reconciliation.In addition, view additional selections on faith and spirtuality from the Moyers Digital Archive.
